Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library
  • public class Library
extends Object
    Class to hold all the information about a library and simulate library functions
    Version:
    (02/12/2020)
    Author:
    (Michael Hird)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Library()
      Create a new library The library contains a list of all resources, a list of all current memebers and a list of all library devices
